title: 2+ Bedroom Single Family Home (**7/30 & 7/31 OPEN HOUSE 9AM-11AM)**)
posting_body: Charming single-family 2+ bedrooms, 1 bath cape style home for rent in South Peabody.
This home features 2 large bedrooms with spacious closets (new carpeting) on the 2nd floor and 2 bedrooms on the first floor (hardwood floors).
It has a 3 season room with loads of sunlight.
Large basement with plenty of storage, including washer and dryer.
Many options for how to set up and utilize the vast amount of space.
Amazing location on a quiet dead end street with a private backyard with views of the pond.
Access to jogging/walking trails, a nature walk, pond and park.
Easy access to shopping and major routes.
We are considering tenants with a credit score of 700+, excellent landlord references, and proven income.
Go to zillow for updated pictures.
